name: Dragon Caller (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
Once per Duel, during your Main Phase, you can use 1 of the following Skills.
● If you control "Lord of D.", add 1 "The Flute of Summoning Dragon" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
● Reveal "The Flute of Summoning Dragon" from your hand, then add 1 "Lord of D." from your Deck or GY to your hand.
